modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the entity's air speed.
modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the entity's air speed.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the entity's air speed.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the entity's air speed.

type.description:
## Modify Air Speed

---


[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_air_speed)

Modifies the air speed of the entity that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:modify_air_speed`

---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:modify_air_speed",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "multiply_total",
        "value": 1.5
    }
}
```

This example will increase the entity's air speed by 150%.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Modify Air Speed (Power Type) date: 2021-10-06

Modify Air Speed

Power Type

Modifies the air speed of the entity that has the power.

Type ID: origins:modify_air_speed

Fields

Field Type Default Description
modifier Attribute Modifier optional If specified, this modifier will be applied to the entity's air speed.
modifiers Array of Attribute Modifiers optional If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the entity's air speed.

Examples

{
    "type": "origins:modify_air_speed",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "multiply_total",
        "value": 1.5
    }
}

This example will increase the entity's air speed by 150%.
